sentences.en: “For example, if you look at a northern community, they might have a substantial amount of caribou in their diet and they might dry the meat in the home, ” he said.
sentences.cn: 他还说：“例如，如果你观察一下北方社区，居民们的饮食中或许有相当多的驯鹿肉，而他们可能在室内把肉晾干。

sentences.en: A band of caribou passed by, twenty and odd animals, tantalizingly within rifle range.
sentences.cn: 一群驯鹿走了过去, 大约有二十多头, 都呆在可望而不可即的来福枪的射程以内.

sentences.en: A herd of antelopes, asses, buffalos, caribou, deer, elephants, elk, giraffes, harts, horses, ibex, moose, seals, sheep, walruses, whales, zebras.
sentences.cn: 一群羚羊，驴，野牛，驯鹿，鹿，大象，麋鹿，长颈鹿，雄鹿，马，野山羊，驼鹿，海豹，山羊，海象，鲸鱼，斑马。

sentences.en: Afar off he heard the squawking of caribou calves.
sentences.cn: 他听到远处有一群小驯鹿尖叫的声音.

sentences.en: After off he heard the squawking of caribou calves.
sentences.cn: 他听见远处传来小驯鹿的尖叫声.

sentences.en: And the rare spotting of a cougar, wolf or woodland caribou takes our breath away.
sentences.cn: 偶尔看到美洲狮 、 狼或者林地驯鹿,会让我们激动到窒息!

sentences.en: Apocalypse Now ( 1979 ) - No, not the ritual sacrifice of a caribou at the end.
sentences.cn: 现代启示录 —— 不, 不是影片最后那个充满宗教意味的驯鹿牺牲.

sentences.en: In the Canadian Yukon, scientists are using genetic techniques to identify caribou and to study ancient caribou that roamed the same ice patches 6,000 years ago.
sentences.cn: 在加拿大的育空地区，科学家们正在利用基因技术来鉴别北美驯鹿，并探究古时驯鹿的相关信息，6000年前它们曾在这块流冰区漫步。

sentences.en: Male caribou start to grow antlers every spring; a transformation from bald to bedecked.
sentences.cn: 雄驯鹿每年春天开始长角, 从秃顶到过分装饰的转换.

sentences.en: The Eskimos played soccer on ice and used balls filled with caribou hair and grass.
sentences.cn: 爱斯基摩人在冰上踢球,他们用的是驯鹿的毛发和草填充成的球.

sentences.en: WOLVES dine on moose and caribou, creatures favoured by Alaska's human hunters.
sentences.cn: 狼以北美驼鹿和驯鹿为食, 这也是阿拉斯加猎人们最喜欢的猎物.
